I am a sixth-year PhD candidate in the [Jeb E. Brooks School of Public Policy](https://publicpolicy.cornell.edu/){target="_blank"} at [Cornell University](https://www.cornell.edu/){target="_blank"}. My areas of research include health economics, health policy, labor economics, and the economics of crime. I am on the 2023-24 job market.
